titles.title: Dǝrsanä Mikaʾel, Homiliary for the feasts of St. Michael / Mälkǝʾa Mikaʾel "Image of Michael"

shortcontents.shortcontent:
I) Dǝrsanä Mikaʾel, Homiliary for the feasts of St. Michael (fols. 2ra-99rb) I-1a) Commemorative notice for the 12th of Ḫǝdar (fols. 2ra-3vb); ʿarke-hymn (fol. 3vb) I-2) Introduction (fol. 4ra-7va) I-1b) Homily by Timothy (Dumatewos), Patriarch of Alexandria for the 12th of Ḫǝdar (fols. 7va-15vb); miracle (fols. 16ra-17rb) I-3) Commemorative notice (fols. 17va-18ra); ʿarke-hymn (fol. 18ra-rb); homily by Patriarch [Metropolitan] Yoḥannǝs the Orthodox for the 12th of Taḫśaś [Miyazya] (fols. 18rb-23rb); miracle (fols. 23va-24rb) I-4) Commemorative notice (fol. 24va-vb); ʿarke-hymn (fols. 24vb-25ra); homily by an anonymous author for Ṭǝrr [Taḫśaś] (fols. 23vb-31ra); miracle (fol. 31ra-vb) I-5) Commemorative notice (fols. 31vb-32rb); ʿarke-hymn (fol. 32rb); homily by an anonymous author for Yäkkatit (fols. 32rb-35vb); miracle (fols. 35vb-36vb) I-6) Commemorative notice (fol. 37ra); ʿarke-hymn (fol. 37ra-rb); homily by [Severus] Patriarch of Antiochia for the 12th of Mäggabit (fols. 37rb-53rb); miracle (fols. 53rb-54va) I-7) Commemorative notice (fols. 54va-55ra); ʿarke-hymn (fol. 55ra); homily [by Epiphanius, Metropolitan of Cyprus] for the 12th of Miyazya [Ṭǝrr] (fols. 55rb-61va); miracle (fols. 61va-63va) I-8) Commemorative notice (fols. 63vb-64rb); ʿarke-hymn (fol. 64rb); homily by Yoḥannǝs, Metropolitan of Ethiopia for the 12th of Gǝnbot (fols. 64rb-66rb); miracle (fols. 66rb-67vb) I-9) Commemorative notice (fols. 68ra-69va); ʿarke-hymn (fol. 69va); homily by Yoḥannǝs, Metropolitan of Aksum (ʾAkwǝsǝm) [for Säne] (fols. 69va-76va); miracle (fols. 76va-78rb) I-10) Commemorative notice (fol. 78rb-vb); ʿarke-hymn (fol. 78vb); homily by Metropolitan Yoḥannǝs for Ḥamle (fols. 78vb-83va); miracle (fols. 84va-84va) I-11) Commemorative notice (fol. 84va-vb); ʿarke-hymn (fols. 84vb-85ra); homily by an anonymous author [for Näḥase] (fols. 85ra-88rb); miracle (fols. 88rb-89va); I-12) Commemorative notice (fol. 89va-vb); ʿarke-hymn (fol. 89vb); homily by an anonymous author for Mäskäräm (fols. 90ra-93rb); miracle (fol. 93rb-vb) I-13) Commemorative notice (fols. 93vb-94vb); ʿarke-hymn (fol. 94vb); homily by an anonymous author for Ṭǝqǝmt (fol. 94vb-98va); miracle (fols. 98vb-99rb) II) Mälkǝʾa Mikaʾel "Image of Michael" (fols. 99va-104rb) (cp. ChRep no. 119)
Additio 1.

copyists.copyist: The hand that wrote Text I (hand a) is very similar, possibly identical, to that of Wäldä Śǝllase (?) of Ms. BGY-013.

donors.donor: According to Additio 1, the Ms. was donated by blatta Wäldä Maryam (of) May ʾAbʾa. His name and the name of his wife Wälättä ʾAnanya are mentioned in supplication formulas throughout Text I. The names of their children are written at the end of Text I.

dcomments.dcomment: Mid 19th – first half of the 20th cent. (?)

txstates.txstate: The leather cover has been cut off from the spine.

bindings.binding: Two wooden boards covered with reddish-brown tooled leather (partly missing). Two pairs of sewing stations.

bndecorations.bndecoration: Blind tooled ornament on the reddish-brown leather cover (at least 5 tools were used: fourfold line fillet, triple circle, x-form, wave form, cross hatching).

bnothers.bnother: Remnants of two pairs of chains of endband stitches at the spine fold of the quires.

squires.squire: I(3; s.l.: 1, stub after 3/fols. 1r-3v) – II(8/fols. 4r-11v) – III(8/fols. 12r-19v) – IV(8/fols. 20r-27v) – V(8/fols. 28r-35v) – VI(8; s.l.: 2, stub after 7; 7, stub after 2/fols. 36r-43v) – VII(8/fols. 44r-51v) – VIII(8/fols. 52r-59v) – IX(6/fols. 60r-65v) – X(8/fols. 66r-73v) – XI(8/fols. 74r-81v) – XII(8; s.l.: 2, stub after 7; 7, stub after 2/fols. 82r-89v) – XIII(8/fols. 90r-97v) – XIV(4/fols. 98r-1031v) – XV(3; s.l.: 1, stub after 3/fols. 102r-104v)

taunit.rl-info: Pricking and ruling are visible. Ruling pattern: 1A-1A-1A1A/0-0/0-0/C. Primary pricks are visible. Ruling pricks are visible. The upper line is written above the ruling. The bottom line is written above the ruling.

ptypeofscripts.ptypeofscript: Mid 19th – first half of the 20th century (?)

phandwritings.phandwriting: Hand a: Fine, careful. Hand b: poor.

pchangeofhands.pchangeofhand: Hand a, Wäldä Śǝllase (?): Text I (fols. 2ra-99rb). The handwriting appears sometimes irregular (cp. fols. 9r vs. 41r vs. 62r). Hand b: Text II (fol. 99va-104rb).

rubrications.rubrication:
Nomina sacra; name of the protagonist and of other characters like Gäbrǝʾel (fols. 9vb, 13ra, 59rb, 83rb, 91va) and Giyorgis (fol. 60vb); names of the donor and his wife; the word sälam "salutation"; elements of the punctuation signs and of the text dividers; elements of Ethiopic numerals.
Several groups of lines on the incipit page of Texts I-2, I-6, I-9 (alternating with black lines); several groups of lines in the incipit of Text I-4, I-8, I-11, I-12 (alternating with black lines); two initial lines of other sections and subsections of Text I, first word in the incipit of subsections (hymns), i.e. sälam "salutation"; initial line of Text II and first word of each strophe.
The rubrication is executed in different ink. The scribe of Text I has used crimson ink but left spaces for names to be rubricated frequently unfilled. These spaces were filled by the scribe of Text II (hand b) in brown or brown-black ink (e.g., fols. 38va, 62rb, 77rb, 79ra, 99rb).

abbreviations.abbreviation: ለዓለ፡ for ለዓለመ፡ ዓለም፡ አሜን፡ (fol. 85ra) ለዓለ፡ ዓለ፡ አሜ፡ for ለዓለመ፡ ዓለም፡ አሜን፡ (fol. 67vb) ለዓለም፡ አሜ፡ for ለዓለመ፡ ዓለም፡ አሜን፡ (fol. 84vb)

otherdetails.otherdetail: The homily for the month Säne is followed by an ʾarke-hymn: ሰላም፡ ለአፎምያ፡ ዘሞዓቶ፡ ለመስቴማ። በዛቲ፡ ዕለት፡ በከመ፡ አዳማ፡ ሥዕለ፡ ሚካኤል፡ መልአከ፡ እንዘ፡ ታነብር፡ በፍጽማ። ውስተ፡ ዘለዓለም፡ ዕረፍት፡ አዕረፍት፡ እምጻማ። (fol. 76va).

additional.tran: Fol. 99rb: This book is of blatta Wäldä Maryam (of) May ˀAbˀa who donated it to (the chruch of) Maryam so that it might be for him a guide to the Kingdom of Heaven.

extras.extra: - Omitted letters written interlineally in hand a: e.g., fols. 4ra, 7ra, 13ra, 14rb, 32vb, 46va, 47ra, 51rb, 68ra, 85ra. - Omissions inserted interlineally in hand b: 24va, 64vb, 91vb, 94vb, 99va. - Scribbles, crude notes: fols. 1v, 73r (numeral 4000), 104v.

txfindingaids.txfindingaid: Monthly readings are indicated by the names of the months written within frames in the upper margin, decorated with frames, in hand b: ዘኅዳር: fol. 2ra ዘህዳር: fol. 4ra ዘታኅሣሥ: fol. 17va ዘጥር: fol. 24va ዘየካቲት: fol. 31vb ዘመጋቢት: fol. 37ra ዘሚያዝያ: fol. 54va ዘግንቦት: fol. 63va ዘሰኔ: fol. 68ra ዘሐምሌ: fol. 78ra ዘነሐሴ: fol. 84va ዘመስከረም: fol. 89va ዘጥቅምት: fol. 93vb.
